Reviews.Title: Video and Power Cable
Reviews.Author: AM "proud mama"
Reviews.Content: This product was as described.  Includes BNC adapters so you don't have to worry about not having the right connections.  Make sure you have the correct power connector end at your power supply and camera.

Reviews.Title: video cable works like a charm
Reviews.Author: leno2002
Reviews.Content: Product was exactly as described. Works perfectly. Couldn't ask for better service or faster shipping. Will likely purchase more in the future

Reviews.Title: Perfect match for my camera...
Reviews.Author: Frank Rice "Unclebens"
Reviews.Content: I had no idea what cables to buy with the camera I purchased, but after adding it to my cart, the option to purchase the cable was offered. I was a bit reluctant, but purchased it anyway. I am pleased to say that the cable is excellent and comes with the required hardware needed to adapt to my camera and another cable. All in all a great product and would recommend it to anyone wanting a high-quality picture.

Reviews.Title: Super value for low-end applications
Reviews.Author: Tech-Guru
Reviews.Content: I used this cable to connect one of my (indoor) security cameras. The cable worked well and did the job. I would not recommend it if you are concerned about interference or if you were using it outdoors (you'll need something with more insulation), but for indoor use, it can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Good cables
Reviews.Author: JTX
Reviews.Content: EDIT: SEE updated review below!These cables work well, however are not shielded and are subject to interference.  I am a ham radio guy and my 40w VHF transmitter causes interference on this cable.  I believe it's due to it not being shielded very well, if at all.  I have another CCTV camera that is not affected however has a much thicker shielded cable jacket.  The cable does work for what it is intended, however beware of interference.  The only time however is at night time when the IR is active. I get some lines of red/blue when the transmitter is active.  Otherwise the cable is good.

Reviews.Title: Not for commercial use
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay.  Attempted to save $25 bucks by purchasing these cables through Amazon.  Perhaps for home use it might work. For commercial application the cables pick up too much noise and static compared to the cables I normally purchase.  This cable will not work well with the high quality cameras I installed.  This cable has both the video and power in just one cable compared to the one I normally use which has two cables side by side, one for video and one for power.  This cable is 1/3 the thickness of my other cables making it very fragile especially for long runs.  Had to replace them with the cables I normally purchased.  At least I was able to successfully use them to pull the good cable in to replace it so my efforts in pulling this cable above a dropped ceiling infested with itchy fiberglass was minimized.  I do not recommend this quality of product for professional installation.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: GV
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cables to add cameras to my new Swann security camera system. I chose these because they were cheaper than other brands and thought cables are cables.......wrong! While running the cables through the attic, one video connector broke off in my hand as i pulled the cable with no resistance.  The other cable, the video connector broke off while connecting to the dvr....WTF! Since I've purchased Q-see cables, installed with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfect
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I ordered four of these cables and they worked perfectly.  Very nice to have the power and video cables all in one.  Made for a much neater and simpler installation of my security cameras.

Reviews.Title: Video & Power Security Cables
Reviews.Author: Retired Tinsnips "uniontinknocker162"
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I needed to finish installing my security cameras...the price was 50% lower than the local lowes store or from the Costco online store site...ordered a few extra 50ft cords and they were delivered within 3 days..video and power feed work fine...

Reviews.Title: 1 Out of 2 Cables Were Bad
Reviews.Author: JDinTX
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these 50ft power/video cables to hook up my cameras to my DVR with.  One worked, the other does not!  Returning tomorrow for a refund.  Everything else works fine so far!

Reviews.Title: Cable for camera
Reviews.Author: mrcass1
Reviews.Content: I bought this cable to go on a ganz camera. It was shipped fast, Packed well, and looked good. Went to install it on the camera and it seemed like the plugs went together sloppy. Just didn't seem to fit well. Picture quality not good at all. had to hold connections by hand to keep screen from flickering. I do not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Interference
Reviews.Author: Tom Frank "boca-reef-guy"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cables.  Unfortunately, both cameras I hooked them up to now have interference (horizontal lines) going through the screen.  The other cameras that I have the original BNC cables have no interference.  The cameras still work, but the interference lines are annoying and take away from the clarity of the picture.I will probably have to try a different brand of cable.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and transaction
Reviews.Author: Street Smart Inc. "Radio Man Indiana"
Reviews.Content: Excellent vendor (have always dealt with them and have NEVER been disappointed!!) and quick transaction. This is not some cheap cord, this is a strong, durable product!! Highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: Works but end are very fragile
Reviews.Author: Alan Fentem
Reviews.Content: After pulling the wires thru my ceiling and getting up in my attic(nasty blown in insulation) and running the wires where they needed to go, I found out the ends were not the same. Dumb...but learn from experience. I taped the wires to a string(not the ends) when I pulled them back out, taped up the ends so they wouldn't get caught. Maybe this is why the connectors are so sensitive. If I bump my dvr, I loose the picture. So I just wiggle them again to get picture back. I would recommed to the manufacturer to have a connector at each end that you can take the ends off when pulling wires. Then plug the different ends back in. I did order more from the same company...I will just try to be more careful this time...adding two more cameras.

Reviews.Title: The one thing that worked!
Reviews.Author: Highlands Falls Community Association, Inc.
Reviews.Content: this is the only item that we purchased for the camera system we purchased that we don't have any problems with. :)

Reviews.Title: BNC Cable for security cameras
Reviews.Author: stephen packard
Reviews.Content: Price these in any brick and mortar and you will pay through the nose. These might be made in China, but they did the trick!

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: John Peck
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, one end of the signal cable was bad.  I couldn't determine if it was the BNC connector or the wire adjacent to the connector but this video cable did not work at all.

Reviews.Title: CCTV cable
Reviews.Author: ALAN "Master"
Reviews.Content: Not so good for long distances ,loose the signal and get interferences.... If you need it for long distances above 50 feet use a better cable ticker and with better protection.

Reviews.Title: GREAT WIRING FOR CLOSED CIRCUIT TV MONITORING SYSTEM!!!
Reviews.Author: Scorpio Sun 46
Reviews.Content: I am quite late in providing a comment. Truth be told, I have bought (and used) a ton of this wiring over a several year period. It is easy to understand, and problem free to install. It is adequately constructed for my purposes, namely maintaining a closed circuit TV monitoring system for my home and property. I would recommend it to others without reservation. I would perhaps prefer that it not ever get “tangled” (reminiscent of backlashes you encounter with a bait cast reel when fishing), but hey, it is well worth the money, and to be fair, it doesn’t get “tangled” all that frequently

Reviews.Title: causes interference with my other Swann cameras attached to DVR
Reviews.Author: Patrick de Vera
Reviews.Content: As title says, it causes interference with one of my Swann cameras when attached to the DVR, once I disconnect from DVR, its fine.  Don't know why.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: J. Hamilton "IT Pro"
Reviews.Content: This is thin cable making it easy to hang with T-25 stables. Reduced one star because it is not rated for outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Great cables!
Reviews.Author: Eddie Phanichkul
Reviews.Content: Used these cables in addition to my security camera system. THEY ARE LONG. I may have over estimated the length, but if I get stranded on a remote island or lost in the jungle, I'm sure I can use this as cordage--or say a zombie apocalypse were to happen and I wasn't able to find any rope. I could braid these into cordage to do a number useful items like boobie traps to kill zombies or wrap myself in it to prevent zombie bites.

Reviews.Title: great signal and utility
Reviews.Author: Expecting What I Pay For
Reviews.Content: the line is long enough to run between a few rooms and it will conduct both power and video.  The adapters for video are also very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great cable
Reviews.Author: Austin N.
Reviews.Content: Not a lot to say about this product, it works very well with my camera and I dont have any complaints.

Reviews.Title: Work great .
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Ends fit nice and wire flex really nice ..Really good video with out cross sound  ... Will buy more later on..

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Robert Jose Garcia Guevara
Reviews.Content: i bought this because it came on combo along with the cctv cams and the extentions of it to guard my house

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Damian Marynski
Reviews.Content: The product comes as described, but make sure to buy the correct Female to Female or Male to Female connections that way you will avoid the trouble of connecting this 50 feet BNC RCA cable to another 50 feet BNC RCA cable. The picture does not go fuzzy, or blank in the winter. With the low temperatures I am still able to look at the camera and see my cars outside of the house.

Reviews.Title: Nice cables
Reviews.Author: bmelody
Reviews.Content: I had to install 2 safety cameras in our laser assembly rooms inside a class 100 clean room. I had to connect the cameras to a monitor on the outside of the clean room as a safety monitor in the event a technician was hurt and needed help. These cables are of good quality and was exactly what I needed to complete the installation. The connector are good and solidly attached and the cables have a power conductor as well as the video cable. All in all a nice dual cable for a neat and quick installation. I normally would make the cables myself but I could not duplicate the cable for the price and did not have the time to build them. I placed an order and 2 days later I had them in hand. Competed the installation ahead of schedule and everything work as planned. I highly recommend these cables.

Reviews.Title: Cable work fine but separation between video and power leads is limited
Reviews.Author: G. R. Ewing Jr.
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo2GDX6TXXUWLDX', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo2GDX6TXXUWLDXloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2GDX6TXXUWLDXcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2GDX6TXXUWLDXcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:22 MinsI found the design of this cable limits the distance between the video connector and the power connector.This of course is not a problem at the camera end, but was limiting at the video recorder end.Please see attached video.

Reviews.Title: Why try to make your own?
Reviews.Author: George Larsen
Reviews.Content: Sure glad I don't have to try and make these any more. what a waste of time. both the 50ft. and the 150 footers are both cheeper to buy than to make myself. many thanks.....George

Reviews.Title: works like it should. came fast enough.
Reviews.Author: innerphreak
Reviews.Content: IT WORKS. it does what its supposed to do. im trying to write enough words for this review to post. a big pain in the a..  other than this post being a pain all was great!!

Reviews.Title: Good cables
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Evansii "Onlybygrace1"
Reviews.Content: These cables have held up very well so far in the heat of summer. We will se what happens when the ice forms. So far I am happy.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Justin Quigley "Justin Quigley"
Reviews.Content: Nice BNC cable i use for security cameras. No quality degradation and worked perfect on 3 different cameras. Didn't feel as if it would split or break when pulled on. I would purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Leonel Romero
Reviews.Content: Just an extension cable with the adapters. I dont know if these are "qualified" for outdoors so I installed it using a protection cover.

Reviews.Title: Well made
Reviews.Author: BigJohn "Big John"
Reviews.Content: This is a very well made cable for your video surveillance cameras. It is very small in diameter and quite flexible. You will be satisfied with this product..

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality
Reviews.Author: Shuie
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product to anyone that has a need for a short cable. Excellent quality and very dependable manufacturer. I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Stagger the Plugs!
Reviews.Author: Hicoteo
Reviews.Content: These are easy to plug in and seem to be good quality.However, Dear Manufacturer, please stagger the plug lengths so that the power plug is not right beside the video plug. For example, on one end of the wire make the power wire about four inches longer and on the other end make the video wire longer. This way cables can be joined without forming a huge ball that can’t pass through conducts.When joining two cables I had to cross and tape the plugs and still struggled to pass them through ¾ in. conduct with curves.I also think it would be nice if they came with a female-to-female coupler instead of or as well as the RCA adapter.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: reeverdawg
Reviews.Content: Cord maintains good signal for both video and sound.  It is so much easier handling a 50 foot cord. I'm planning on buying two more to replace my other 100' cords.

Reviews.Title: Low quality
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: There was quite a bit of signal degradation after 50 ft of this stuff.  Cured the problem by switching to a high quality coax

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Video & Power 50 feet BNC RCA Cable
Reviews.Author: D. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Arrived on time. Hooked up fine. I don't know what else to write, only 3 more words to go.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: gduncan229
Reviews.Content: Had everything I needed. Just ran the wires to the camera and it did the job. Not much more I think needs to be said.

Reviews.Title: Power cable and supply
Reviews.Author: Donald K. Landstrom "Portland2"
Reviews.Content: Part of a set to power a remote camera and provide a Video input to a VCR.  Nicely built with good quality components.

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: This VideoSecu Video & Power 50 Feet BNC RCA Cable for Security Cameras works as expected.  I purchased several and I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Good/cheap cable
Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: Decent cable for wiring. I used it on my home CCTV home system and it did the job just as good as the more expensive wire. Just note it is not as thick of cable so be cautious when wiring to not hang it up and tug too hard. It could rip the copper wire inside. It did not happen to me but should be noted.

Reviews.Title: Did the trick
Reviews.Author: R. Escalante
Reviews.Content: I added these cables (using a Female to Female BNC Coupler) to a 60 foot cable on my Lorex DVR surveillance system.  There is no visible degradation in video quality and although I didn't measure before and after current draw, the dc power transformer doesn't seem to get warm to the touch (running 4 cameras).

Reviews.Title: These are great for the price
Reviews.Author: Mike Martin
Reviews.Content: These cables are as good as any I have used, and they are far less expensive as those I buy locally. So I paid half the cost for an equally good cable.

Reviews.Title: Great ready to use cable.
Reviews.Author: Ray562
Reviews.Content: Its very easy to use this cable with no hassle hook up to your camera's.One end fits the camera and the other end hooks up to your DVR.

Reviews.Title: Great cables
Reviews.Author: Nathan Johnson
Reviews.Content: These cables work great, I got two of them to extend the 60ft cables that came with my Zmodo camera system. The 4-camera power splitter still works even at 110ft of cable and the signal is still good.

Reviews.Title: Connecting cord
Reviews.Author: Victor V.
Reviews.Content: 50 feet for my application was enough it should really be supplied with 100 feet of connecting cord so that it will be sufficient for any connection around the house, it had 2 adapters for tv connection which were included in the price,in short easy to connect andset up

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: You can tell these cables are made better than some of the others. The adapters are a nice bonus. I will buy these again if I need more.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: Robert payne
Reviews.Content: Added a couple cameras to our system and needed some cables, great cables. Good value, great cables...worked as needed...thank you

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Video & Power 50 Feet BNC RCA Cable for Security Cameras 1JD
Reviews.Author: walter loggins
Reviews.Content: The reason I am give this cable only three stars is the BNC to RCA adapters will not fit to the cable BNC.  The adapter will not go in far enough to get a twist lock.  I know I can do some filing to get it to fit but .........  Other than that , I am happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Poor connections
Reviews.Author: jrich67
Reviews.Content: Used this to run from the front of an RV to the back for installation of a backup camera.  It all works fine but the BNC to RCA connectors are not tight and I am worried they are going to fall out through vibrations of driving down the road.  Also you need to be prepared to purchase additional adapters depending on the male vs female type of RCA connector you are going to and coming from.

Reviews.Title: Dont buy these as extensions.
Reviews.Author: Satisfied
Reviews.Content: I bought these cables to be used as extensions but I did not pay attention to picture. It has two female bnc connectors. It needs a male and female end to be used as an extension otherwise you have to use a coupler.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Monte Wells
Reviews.Content: I need to extend my CCTV cameras and this item worked great.  This cable was better quality than the one that came with the Zmodo camera system.

Reviews.Title: Ideal
Reviews.Author: Wesley Sladek
Reviews.Content: Good length, with strong connection adapters and plugs. Check out the 100 ft length as well. Installed outdoors, and so far it seems quite water proof.

Reviews.Title: Perfect cable,easy to install !
Reviews.Author: Craig Collins
Reviews.Content: This cable was perfect for my use. It was easy to run and install.I will use again if needed.

Reviews.Title: The price is right, but...
Reviews.Author: Woodlandsman "Woodlandsman"
Reviews.Content: These are fine for some things and mostly for "do it yourself" installs. These come in various lengths, but they all seem about the same in terms of picture quality - which is, "OK" but not great. Better wire will get better results, but cost more too.

Reviews.Title: Good cable
Reviews.Author: Anonymous "tapeworm"
Reviews.Content: I'm using these with ASIN: B000TBG8BU (which require a separate power supply) and they work great. There is a small delay in the video picture, I assume because the cable is so long, it's maybe a second or two at most.

Reviews.Title: Video Cord
Reviews.Author: Virginia Hill
Reviews.Content: The ends were not the right size so my brother put some on for me. There was certainly plenty of it.

Reviews.Title: BNC and RCA connectors are good---wiring gauge too small and fragile.
Reviews.Author: bikeryakman
Reviews.Content: Wiring is too small of a gauge and is very hard to work with and easily damaged during installation, so I suggest that you buy extra sets.

Reviews.Title: works perfect
Reviews.Author: A Slate "Slate Construction"
Reviews.Content: works perfect for my needs, you will have to but the BNC adaptors if this is to be added to an existing video cable.Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Camera 50' wire
Reviews.Author: MGS
Reviews.Content: Although the wire is a little smaller than the original wire supplied with the camera, it does the job OK

Reviews.Title: It’s wire  and it work well
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: It’s wire  and it work well .....It’s wire  and it work well ......It’s wire  and it work well ..... It’s wire  and it work well

Reviews.Title: It is what it is...
Reviews.Author: John Chalinder "Gentleman & Rogue"
Reviews.Content: Not much to say about something as simple as this.It reaches where I need it to; it works as it should.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Robert Pritchard
Reviews.Content: works great thanks ran the cord all arounf the out side of my home and so far no problem well made for the price

Reviews.Title: It is what it is.
Reviews.Author: John A. Davis
Reviews.Content: It is what it is. Dose the job with very thin wire. I see no difference with this and the heaver wires on my security system.

Reviews.Title: Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Mallyn
Reviews.Content: Has all the hook ups required to connect a camera. Was a little slow at showing up but will buy again when expanding my camera system.

Reviews.Title: Great to have these items available...
Reviews.Author: C.C.
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased as an accessory because the original cable was pulled too hard and the connectors were pulled off. Item was exactly what i was looking for to replace the broken cable. Fits perfect....

Reviews.Title: Great for Short Distances
Reviews.Author: AMD
Reviews.Content: Had ordered 3 of the 100 ft cables and I realized after installing the cameras I had one that was close to the DVR so I ordered  this shorter cable to finish up the camera closest to the DVR...comes with connections needed so there is no hassle installing....GREAT DEAL too......can't beat Amazon...

Reviews.Title: They work like they should
Reviews.Author: Glenn A. Jakubowski
Reviews.Content: I don't know how you can say a lot about cables, just that they are made well and look like they will last awhile... oh, and they work.

Reviews.Title: cables
Reviews.Author: longknife11
Reviews.Content: i returned the security system to amazon that i was going to use these on but i decided to keep them for the future

Reviews.Title: BNC cable extension
Reviews.Author: paul higa
Reviews.Content: I would like to have had a male BNC connector on one end and a female BNC connector on the other.

Reviews.Title: This cord works!
Reviews.Author: Puna
Reviews.Content: One of my cords got nicked in the factory and broke.  It would have cost 4-5 times more from Lorex Technology.  It's a little bit shorter where it attackes in the back, but it does the job.

Reviews.Title: How i expected !!
Reviews.Author: GUILLERMO ROSARIO
Reviews.Content: It is a good product that I've used before, so I buy it again.I believe that I can recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Tayls "Tayls"
Reviews.Content: I like these cords better than the originals that came with my system.  They are flexible and didn't become rock hard in the cold while installing.

Reviews.Title: Good product/good price
Reviews.Author: Bud
Reviews.Content: Good product so far. As advertised, however the only negative it did no come with connectors. I was extending the wire, as a result had to drive 50 miles round trip to Radio Shack, and a major inconvenience. Does not take away from product but if not included, it should have been noted and suggested as an add on item.

Reviews.Title: is what it is
Reviews.Author: Aaron L. Dunphy
Reviews.Content: The cables are good for low quality cctv systems.  If you are looking to cable up cameras over 420 tvl, I'd recommend RG6 coax or Cat6 with Baluns

Reviews.Title: Great Cables
Reviews.Author: A. J. Richter "Seeker's Quest"
Reviews.Content: What can I say, It's a Cable, It has a Duel roll, It Powers a Camera ( SECURITY ) and has Both RCA & BNC Leads plus adapters for both, if needed. I'd rate the cable as Lite to Medium Weight, So be careful to Add support on those long runs.One suggestion, Run these cables threw Conduit piping for outside use, It'll keep those Birds & other wildlife from chewing them up!..

Reviews.Title: Good connection.
Reviews.Author: Grace W
Reviews.Content: I order for camera and VCR works, need connection between them. Get good connection and it's work. Good price too.

Reviews.Title: Works very well.
Reviews.Author: David Kang
Reviews.Content: I bought this cable for connecting my new cctv camera and a tv monitor. It's simple and easy to connect and long enough to set your cctv if you have a restaurant or coffeeshop.

Reviews.Title: Does the job...
Reviews.Author: James Southard "JoeCop"
Reviews.Content: I needed this to run an additional camera to an exterior location.  It does the job and the video quality is good.  It seems to be well made...

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Bob "Bob."
Reviews.Content: they worked for my camera.... just make sure u check your camera to see if you also need the audio jack as well...my mistake please learn from it

Reviews.Title: Just the ticket
Reviews.Author: DodgeD
Reviews.Content: This is a good product, works well and is nicely constructed I have also a one hundred foot long and a One hundred fifty foot length ones also excellent.

Reviews.Title: really good cable
Reviews.Author: Allen-the-not-so-wise
Reviews.Content: The cable had less line loss than I expected.  The picture was still very clear.  Now I own three of these cables.

Reviews.Title: Must Have For Security Systems
Reviews.Author: nightowl
Reviews.Content: Best price for the product.  Works great and makes camera installation very easy.  Allows you to put camera anywhere you want.

Reviews.Title: very light
Reviews.Author: john deer "john"
Reviews.Content: this cord will work but allows a lot of interference  and is not very ruged . would purchase the heaver cord next time.

Reviews.Title: videosecu video & power  50 feet rca cable
Reviews.Author: wildroses
Reviews.Content: videosecu video & power 50 feet rca cable was nice combination of wireing for the survailence camers but it would have been to had the audio cable included. I had to buy the audio cable later and run it along side the videosecu video & power 50 feet rca cable

Reviews.Title: Video and Power 50 feet BNC RCA Cable for Security Cameras
Reviews.Author: Lin Hammond
Reviews.Content: The cable was a good quality product and allowed me to connect my security camera to it. I would order this product again.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: DANAL
Reviews.Content: I put this on a camera I bought and it is working as should, the view of thefront of the house and drive is super good in daytime, and it is real good at night to.

Reviews.Title: Great price, standard quality
Reviews.Author: Gold 2008
Reviews.Content: The seller shipped it very fast. Cable is quite flexible, works well as delivered & the small diameter makes installation easier.this item is adequate for the normal homeowner DVR/camera setup, plus - it's CHEAP at less than $10.These inexpensive made in China cables all seem to use one insulated VIDEO wire, one insulated POWER wire & a SHARED bare ground wire wrappedaround the two positive wires. The insulated wires are tiny, looks to be size 22AWG (same deal for the less expensive camera's)I cut open the cable from a dead $179.00 Sw??n camera, it's the same.*IMHO of course............

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive Cable / Works Well
Reviews.Author: Dominic A. Pizza
Reviews.Content: Cable is inexpensive and quality is good.  I have 4 of these cables 1x 100' and 3x 50' all of them work well.  Cable set includes BNC to RCA adaptors so you can use this with pretty much any device.  A 3/4" hole is perfect for getting the connectors and a cable fish pole through walls.

Reviews.Title: Great Extender Cable,..for a Great Price!!
Reviews.Author: BKWeber
Reviews.Content: Works Great with the CCTV Camera I baught,...gets the job done!,...and come's w/ RCA Adapters for hooking up to Composit Video Input,..or w/o the adpter for Standard Security DVR Connections.Good Deal!

Reviews.Title: misspenny
Reviews.Author: miss roxie
Reviews.Content: sorry but l really didn't need it so l didn't use. so l still have the product maybe my grandson could use.

Reviews.Title: Not very high quality
Reviews.Author: Webfan
Reviews.Content: I had to hard wire the power part of this cable to my spot monitor, as it came with leads only -- no plug. So I cut off the plug from the cable and stripped down the wires. I was surprised that the neutral wire had no sheathing inside the main covering. Most Siamese wiring I've worked with, both bulk and pre-cut, the inner power wires are both covered with their own insulation. On this one it's just the hot lead. The neutral is bare wire. Also, I had a heck of a time with the BNC connection to my DVR. I think the plug may have had a slight flaw in it's manufacturing, which made it nearly impossible to attach. I finally accomplished it with the help of some pliers. Once attached, the video signal is good, though, so it's functionally fine. I never had either of these problems with the Swann cables I've purchased in the past. Next time I'll go back to Swann.

Reviews.Title: Wiring Kit
Reviews.Author: Michael Breier
Reviews.Content: Returned this item because I didn't need it. Wiring a home for video surveillance was much more difficult than I anticipated.

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cable; For camera with DC power only
Plug and Play ready
50 feet video/power cables in black
Video/Power cable has BNC connectors and includes 2 BNC/RCA adapters
Output type BNC video connector & 2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Video & Power 50 Feet BNC RCA Cable for Security Cameras 1JD
